name: Affairs of the Art
summary: Beryl's back in "Affairs of the Art", which showcases one family's eccentric yet endearing obsessions with everything from drawing to screw threads and pet taxidermy.
info:
• 上映年度: 2021年
  • 片长: 16分钟
  • 导演: Joanna Quinn
  • 脚本: Les Mills
  • 音乐: Benjamin Talbott
  • 原画: Joanna Quinn
  • 剪辑: Mia Rose Goddard
  • 制片人: Michael Fukushima、Les Mills
